name: curaq-tui
description: CuraQ CLI/TUI client - A retro terminal UI for managing articles

scripts.build: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=node --format=esm --define:__APP_VERSION__="\"$VERSION\"" --packages=external && sed -i '1i#!/usr/bin/env node' dist/index.js
scripts.release: pnpm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: polidog
